scripts.start:dev: set APP_ENV=development& set APP_TESTING=false& pm2 start src/app.js
scripts.start:prod: set APP_ENV=production& set APP_TESTING=false& pm2 start src/app.js
scripts.start:devtest: set APP_ENV=development& set APP_TESTING=true& pm2 start src/app.js
scripts.start:prodtest: set APP_ENV=production& set APP_TESTING=true& pm2 start src/app.js
scripts.test:dev: set APP_ENV=development& set APP_TESTING=true& mysql -uimporter -pimporter boilerplate_testing < dbdump-testing.sql& mocha ./tests
scripts.test:prod: set APP_ENV=production& set APP_TESTING=true& mysql -uimporter -pimporter boilerplate_testing < dbdump-testing.sql& mocha ./tests
